sentence.Network_en: They had the laborious task of cutting down the huge tree.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们接受了伐大树的艰苦工作.

sentence.Network_en: Keeping the garden tidy all year round can be a laborious task.
sentence.Network_cn: 一年到头把花园拾掇得干净整洁也不是件轻松活儿。

sentence.Network_en: The distance seemed interminable, and the walk was most laborious.
sentence.Network_cn: 距离好象无穷无尽似的, 走起来真够吃力.

list.abs: laborious的翻译中文意思... ... a laborious style 不流畅的文体 laborious bees 勤劳的蜜蜂 laborious style 不流畅的文体.
Panel painting involved a painstaking , laborious process ., 镶板绘画是个费心费力的过程.
a road from Ledo to China was also an immense , laborious task .从利多建筑一条通往中国的公路，也是一个巨大而艰苦的任务。
辛苦的... ... 2. to plod through your work 辛苦地工作 3. hard work;laborious work 辛苦的工作 4. You were hard. 你辛苦了。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'industrious, assiduous'): from Old French laborieux, from Latin laboriosus, from labor 'labour'

entry.tran: 耗时费力的；辛苦的；艰难的
entry.def: If you describe a task or job as laborious, you mean that it takes a lot of time and effort.

example.ex: Keeping the garden tidy all year round can be a laborious task.
example.tran: 一年到头把花园拾掇得干净整洁也不是件轻松活儿。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by toilsome effort to the point of exhaustion; especially physical effort;

sentences.sentence: "worked their arduous way up the mining valley"
"spent many laborious hours on the project"

auth_sentence.content: Yet buying a Ducati has remained old-fashioned and laborious.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet buying a Ducati has remained old-fashioned and laborious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet buying a Ducati has remained old-fashioned and laborious.

auth_sentence.content: A laborious composition, no doubt written under duress.
auth_sentence.res_content: A laborious composition, no doubt written under duress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A laborious composition, no doubt written under duress.

auth_sentence.content: The whole process is very laborious and unreliable.
auth_sentence.res_content: The whole process is very laborious and unreliable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The whole process is very laborious and unreliable.

stems_affixes.word_buile: labor劳动+ed……的→被劳动出来的→费力的
labor劳动+atory场所→劳动的地方→实验室

stems_affixes.value_cn: 痛打,重击,不断辱骂和嘲弄
stems_affixes.word_buile: be构成动词+labor劳动→过分劳作→过分做事或哆嗦
col共同+labor劳动+ate表动词→共同劳作→合作

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精心制作, 详细阐述
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+labor劳动+ate表动词→v.精心制作, 详细阐述

means.word_mean: 勤劳的;困难的, 费力的

sentences.en: They had the laborious task of cutting down the huge tree.
sentences.cn: 他们接受了伐大树的艰苦工作。
